tasks.label: python:stdin
args: $python = if (Test-Path '${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe') { '${workspaceFolder}\.venv\Scripts\python.exe' } elseif ($env:RYAN_TOOLS_PYTHON) { $env:RYAN_TOOLS_PYTHON } else { 'python' }; $snippet = if ($env:RYAN_TOOLS_SNIPPET) { $env:RYAN_TOOLS_SNIPPET } else { '${workspaceFolder}\repo-scripts\run_snippet.py' }; Get-Content -Raw - | & $python $snippet
